name: Easy Creamy Mac 'N Cheese
author: Country Crock®
summary: Our recipe for Easy Creamy Mac 'N Cheese has only 5 ingredients and is on the table in less than 30 minutes. What's not to love about that?! Whether you serve it on the side or as a main dish, it's comfort food that the whole family will love.
directions: Cook pasta in large pot according to package directions
Meanwhile, whisk milk, Country Crock® Spread, and flour in large saucepan
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, whisking frequently
Reduce heat and cook, stirring occasionally, until thickened, about 5 minutes
Stir in cheese until melted; remove from heat
Drain pasta and fold into the sauce
